description: Fecundis is an innovative startup, aiming to revolutionize cattle production in Argentina and beyond. With a focus on enhancing in vitro fertilization rates and improving animal genetics, Fecundis seeks to address inefficiencies in food production. The initiative combines scientific expertise with entrepreneurial spirit, supported by local and international investors, to create sustainable solutions that contribute to food security and environmental sustainability in the agricultural sector.
name: Fecundis
